skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: global player
Developer Terms of Use
des:
===========================
LIVE RADIO
We’re the official home to some of the UK’s biggest and best-loved radio stations such as Heart, Capital, LBC, Capital XTRA, Capital Dance, Classic FM, Smooth, Radio X and Gold. Listen to these stations and more on your Alexa.

Example Commands:
Alexa, ask Global Player to play Heart 
Alexa, ask Global Player to play Capital
Alexa, ask Global Player to play Radio X
Alexa, ask Global Player to play Classic FM
Alexa, ask Global Player to play Smooth
Alexa, ask Global Player to play LBC
Alexa, ask Global Player to play Gold

===========================
7 DAY CATCH UP
We’ve got everyone from Chris Moyles to James O’Brien, and Anne-Marie Minhall to Jamie and Amanda all available on-demand.

Want to listen to a specific show? You can add dates to your request by asking Global Player to play yesterday’s show.

While a show is playing, you can skip ahead by asking Global Player to fast forward 30 minutes, go back in time by asking Global Player to rewind 5 minutes, or even go to a specific point in time by asking Global Player to jump to 1 hour and 30 minutes.

Example Commands:
Alexa, ask Global Player to play Classic FM at the Movies from Saturday
Alexa, ask Global Player to play Heart Breakfast from yesterday
Alexa, ask Global Player to fast forward 15 minutes
Alexa, ask Global Player to rewind 5 minutes
Alexa, ask Global Player to jump to 1 hour and 30 minutes

===========================
PLAYLISTS
Access a variety of live playlists to suit your mood. From latest chart releases and gym workouts to focus and relaxation - there's a playlist here for you. To get started, ask Global Player to play your chosen playlist. Not sure what to listen to? You can also ask Global Player for a playlist recommendation!

Example Commands
Alexa, ask Global Player to play Classic FM Relax
Alexa, ask Global Player to recommend me a playlist

===========================
PODCASTS
You can find thousands of podcasts on Global Player - from our fascinating Global Originals including The News Agents and My Therapist Ghosted Me, to worldwide smashes like Spencer & Vogue, Dirty John, The Daily and loads more!

Want to listen to your favourite Global radio presenter’s podcast instead of their entire show on catch-up? Simply add the word ’podcast’ to your request.

If you want to hear the first episode of a podcast, just ask Global Player to play the first episode of your chosen podcast. You can also ask Alexa to navigate to the next podcast.

You can now use Global Player to discover new podcasts tailored to your listening habits. Just ask Global Player to recommend a podcast.

Example Commands:
Alexa, ask Global Player to play the News Agents
Alexa, ask Global Player to play Nick Abbot the whole show podcast
Alexa, ask Global Player to play the first episode of Filthy Ritual
Alexa, ask Global Player to recommend me a podcast

===========================
SEND A COMMENT
You can send a comment to the UK’s best loved stations straight from your Alexa device. Simply say 'Alexa, send a comment' to your chosen station. Keep listening to the station to hear if your comment is read out by your favourite presenter!

Example Commands:
Alexa, send a comment to Radio X
Alexa, send a comment to Capital
Alexa, send a comment to LBC

===========================
HD RADIO
Want the best quality sound when listening to our live radio stations? Make sure you ask Global Player to turn on HD.

Example Commands:
Alexa, ask Global Player to turn on HD Radio
Alexa, ask Global Player to turn off HD Radio

===========================
RECOMMENDATIONS
Not sure what to listen to? We've got you covered! Just ask Global Player to make a recommendation.

Example Commands:
Alexa, ask Global Player to recommend me something
Alexa, ask Global Player to recommend me a playlist
Alexa, ask Global Player to recommend me a podcast

Got some feedback? We’d love to hear from you, simply email alexa@global.com
